findTemplatesFor

private java.util.List findTemplatesFor(java.lang.Object target)
Find the List of templates that could apply to this target object. That includes the templates for its class and all superclasses. Needs-More-Work: should cache.

evaluate

private java.util.List evaluate(java.util.Map bindings,
                                java.lang.String expr)
                         throws ExpansionException
Evaluate an expression. The expression can be in the form -

Style 1 expressionpart{.expressionpart}

Note - {} indicates an optional repeating expression part

The first expressionpart should be the keyword "self" which refers to the first bound object in the bindings map. Any further expressionparts are either attributes, methods or properties of the preceding part.

For example

  • Given a Point self.x would return the x instance variable from Point
  • Given a List self.size would return the result of the size() method on that List
  • Given a Color self.red would return the red property of that Color (by calling the getRed() method)

For example, given a Component, the expression self.minimumSize.width will get the minimum width of that Component by first calling getMinimumSize() and then retrieving the width attribute from the result of that call.

If an expressionpart returns a collection or an array then the range of the items returned can be restricted by specifying a required range as a comma seperated start and end values. These values can be integer numbers with 0 representing the first item. An last item can be represented by *.

For example, given a Container, the expression self.getComponents[1,*] will return all components except the first.

Style 2 package.Class.staticMethod(style1expression)

The second form of an expression allows a value evaluated from the first form to be passed to some static method. For example, given a Color, the expression org.tigris.gef.util.PgmlUtility.getPgmlColor(self) will pass the Color as an argument to the getPgmlColor method of PgmlUtility in order to format the Color according to PGML style.

Parameters:
bindings - A map of expression part to object bindings. This is expected to be prepopulated with "self" bound to the main target object.
expr - The expression to evaluate.
Returns:
A list of resulting items that satisy the expression.
Throws:
ExpansionException - on any error.
